<h3 id="X22654">X(22654) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ARA AND 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^5+(b+c)*a^4-2*b*c*a^3-(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c))  :  :
<p>X(22654) lies on these lines:
{1,159}, {3,10}, {4,17111}, {11,4186}, {20,11677}, {22,2975}, {24,104}, {25,34}, {28,3433}, {36,8185}, {55,8192}, {65,1473}, {119,21479}, {198,1212}, {222,14529}, {388,4224}, {405,19836}, {517,12517}, {859,7742}, {956,8193}, {960,20876}, {962,1633}, {963,1436}, {999,11365}, {1043,16876}, {1191,7083}, {1329,16434}, {1406,3937}, {1460,4252}, {1598,22753}, {1602,1610}, {1616,16686}, {1617,1661}, {1995,5253}, {2178,16968}, {2182,12680}, {2551,19649}, {3086,4222}, {3145,8240}, {3189,20871}, {3304,20988}, {3428,11414}, {4185,7354}, {4214,12943}, {4999,19544}, {5204,20989}, {5260,7485}, {5594,22757}, {5595,22756}, {6642,10269}, {7078,8679}, {7293,19860}, {7387,11249}, {7428,8069}, {7517,22765}, {8071,11334}, {8190,11493}, {8191,11492}, {8194,22761}, {8195,22762}, {9630,11396}, {9861,22504}, {9876,22565}, {9908,22659}, {9909,11194}, {9910,18237}, {9911,22770}, {9912,12773}, {9913,22775}, {9914,22778}, {9915,22774}, {9916,22773}, {9917,22779}, {9918,22780}, {9919,22583}, {9920,22781}, {9921,22595}, {9922,22624}, {10037,22766}, {10046,22767}, {10790,22520}, {10831,22759}, {10832,22760}, {10833,10835}, {10834,22768}, {10896,17516}, {11641,19162}, {11853,22755}, {12310,22586}, {12410,12513}, {12411,22777}, {12412,19478}, {12413,19159}, {12414,22782}, {13175,22514}, {13222,22560}, {13680,22783}, {13737,20470}, {13743,16119}, {13800,22784}, {13889,22763}, {13943,22764}, {16828,19286}, {18242,21484}, {19005,19013}, {19006,19014}, {22655,22680}, {22656,22771}, {22657,22772}, {22658,22776}</p>
<p>
X(22654) = isogonal conjugate of isotomic conjugate of X(21279)<br>
X(22654) = complement of X(20211)<br>
X(22654) = polar conjugate of isotomic conjugate of X(23122)<br>
X(22654) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3220, 3556), (1, 13730, 1486), (3, 9798, 197), (159, 18610, 1486), (956, 20833, 8193), (999, 20831, 11365), (12513, 20872, 12410)<br>
